Welcome to Hope Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic, a trusted wellness center in New Westminster, led by renowned acupuncturist Dr. Eva Fang Yuan (RAc, Doctor of TCM). We specialize in holistic healing practices including acupuncture, cupping, moxibustion, guasha, and traditional Chinese herbal medicine, all tailored to meet your unique health goals.


At Hope Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic, our mission is to restore harmony and vitality to your body, mind, and spirit. We are dedicated to guiding you on your journey to optimal health, empowering you to achieve lasting wellness. Discover a balanced and revitalized life—begin your healing journey with us at Hope Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic, where true wellness begins.


Service & Fees
Initial Acupuncture Treatment - 90 min $120
Subsequent Acupuncture Treatment - 60 min $100
Initial Facial Rejuvenation Acupuncture - 90 min $150
Subsequent Facial Rejuvenation Acupuncture - 60 min $125
Subsequent Herbal Treatment - 20 min $30
Frequently Asked Questions

What can I expect during treatment?

For more details on each type of treatment, please visit our Treatments page.

Do you do direct billing?

We are registered acupuncturist, but do not do direct billing to MSP or insurance company. A receipt will be issued after each session. Patients can claim their subsidy or extended health insurance using the receipts.

What payment methods do you accept?

Debit/Credit cards, E-transfer, cash are all accepted.
